{"id":548130764,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1630551066,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"39 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/548130764/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Array Nesting","memory":"29.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int arrayNesting(vector<int>& nums) {\n      vector<bool>vis(nums.size(),false);\n        int res=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++)\n        {\n            if(vis[i]==false)\n            {\n                \n                int start=nums[i];\n                int count=0;\n                do\n                {\n                    start=nums[start];\n                    count++;\n                    vis[start]=true;\n                \n                res=max(res,count);\n                }while(start!=nums[i]);\n                 \n            }\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"array-nesting"}
